data.actual_result: The suggestions dissapear even if you typed something valid
data.short_description: Searching with a specific symbol rather than just plain text for search filters causes unexpected issues
data.steps_to_repro: - Open search in a channel - Use the ``in:`` filter - Type in a ``#`` and then observe that the channels eligible are shown - Type in another character to filter from channels - Notice how all the filtered results go away as if you typed something invalid
